remMethod.val: 不知细叶谁裁(tailor)出， 二月春风似剪刀(scissor)

words.tran: 定做的；裁缝做的；剪裁讲究的
[服装] 剪裁，做衣服；裁缝业，成衣业
裁制；调整使适应（tailor的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to make something so that it is exactly right for someone’s particular needs or for a particular purpose
someone whose job is to make men’s clothes, that are measured to fit each customer perfectly
